rules_text:
When Gubernatorial Fundraiser enters, make a pledge. [i](Create any red Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)[/i]
When Gubernatorial Fundraiser dies, create a tapped Treasure token.
notes:
Art Validated
!addtoken Penrath Insurgency;1;Vishanki Inc.;1;Hazakh Arsenal;1
